title: AI and the workforce: Tech’s ‘culture reset’ is now often about doing more with fewer hands
description: Artificial intelligence is changing how companies operate. Many businesses are now rethinking their staffing needs. AI is automating routine tasks, leading to fewer jobs in some areas. Companies are focusing on employees with AI skills. This shift means slower hiring and leaner teams.

title: AI transforming farming, says Maha official; cites smart cow necklaces, satellite sugar tests
description: Artificial intelligence is already transforming agriculture for millions of smallholder farmers. Innovations like smart necklaces for cows in Kashmir detect infections early. Satellites accurately predict sugarcane sweetness.

title: Small-cap IT stock jumps over 6% after these AI data centre and acquisition updates
description: Blue Cloud Softech Solutions share price has rallied 23% in one month, and has fallen 29% in six months. The small-cap stock has declined 20% in one year and has dropped 21% in two years.

title: Why Galgotias University was asked to vacate AI Impact Summit
description: Galgotias University has been asked to vacate the India AI Impact Summit 2026, following a controversy over its display of a Chinese robotic dog as its own creation.

title: Beyond Nvidia: 4 AI Stocks Flying Under the Radar
description: Market Analysis by covering: Super Micro Computer Inc, Synopsys Inc, Arista Networks, Vertiv Holdings Co. Read 's Market Analysis on Investing.com NG.
